scripts.serve: port=$(shuf -i 2000-65000 -n 1); echo serving on: :$port; serve -Sn -p $port dist &   lt -p $port -s $(whoami)$(basename $PWD | sed 's/[^a-z^0-9]*//g')
scripts.dev: npm run build; npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: if [ ! -d './dist/.git' ]; then git -C dist init; git -C dist checkout -B gh-pages; git -C dist remote add origin $(git config --get remote.origin.url); fi; git -C dist add --all .; git -C dist reset $(git -C dist commit-tree  HEAD^{tree} -m 'ðŸ†•'); git -C dist push -f origin HEAD
scripts.deploy-surge: echo Surge.sh not yet setup # surge
scripts.deploy: npm run build && (npm run deploy-gh-pages; npm run deploy-surge)
